amendment.description: To set aside an increased amount for the Collaborative Information Warfare Network at the Critical Infrastructure Protection Center at the Space Welfare Systems Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 743 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 743 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S6895-6896; text: CR S6896) To set aside an increased amount for the Collaborative Information Warfare Network at the Critical Infrastructure Protection Center at the Space Welfare Systems Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 743 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 743 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham SC.
